summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6105 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 11, Pleasant Valley Addition, being the alley between 34th Avenue West and 35th Avenue West from Emerson Street to Ruffner Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84248, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
